direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle locale selection with similar control flows and random number generation.
Both methods involve locale selection and processing, though displayName() focuses on formatting the locale display name.
Both methods access and utilize the list of supported locales.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require access to the list of supported locales for initialization.
Both methods involve random locale selection, which can be tested in sequence to ensure deterministic behavior.
The output of localeStringWithRandom() can be verified by comparing it with the expected display name format from displayName().
